name: Ping Pong Fighters
description:
Welcome to the biggest tournament of the universe ! In a future where table tennis is the main event, come in and fight to be the best !


Ping Pong Fighters is the first game mixing table tennis and fighting games in the most arcade way possible. It's a multiplayer only game, you can enjoy with keyboard or gamepads.



This game was made during the first year of the ENJMIN (France) by five students :

  • Victor Grosclaude (gamedesign and programming)
  • Paul Heynen (graphic design)
  • Victor Mellini (graphic design and music)
  • Noé Mignard (sound design)
  • Guillaume Grannec (managing)
